channel.title: Smudge Effect
channel.description:
V1 - [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/111ic9j.png[/img]
V2 - [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/59wmyc.png[/img]
Basic smudging, not much added. Just a little bit of abstract.
And before you give CC, abstract has to have flow. The depth part will come soon lol. (By the way, this is why I don't do text -.-)
